feed.title: Category: Cfps | Jonathan LeBlanc - Developer Advocate

entry.title: Conference Calls for Proposals in North America (10/14)
entry.content:
Below is our next batch of conference CFPs in North America. Of note in this list are the O’Reilly conferences. OSCON has switched the location of their conference in 2016 from Portland to Austin, so take note of that. In addition, there are a number of security conferences that are looking for speakers.

Here’s the list:

General

  • O’Reilly software Architecture conference (April 10-11, New York): CFP closes Oct 31st
  • O’Reilly OSCON (May 16-19, Austin): CFP closes Nov 24th
  • DevNexus (February 15-17, Atlanta): CFP closes Nov 5th
  • Twilio Signal (May 24-25, San Francisco): CFP closes Dec 1st
  • Midwest PHP (March 4-5, Minneapolis): CFP closes Nov 15th
  • PyTennessee (February 6-7, Nashville): CFP closes Nov 15th
  • PyCon (May 28-June 5th, Portland): CFP closes November 30th

Security

  • BSides (April 16, Nashville): CFP closes Dec 31
  • BSides (January 16, New York): CFP closes Nov 17th
  • Shmoocon (January 15-17, Washington DC): CFP closes Nov 20th

entry.title: Conference Calls for Proposals in North America (05/11)
entry.content:
Good afternoon all,

Below is a current list of curated calls for papers throughout North America. These are sorted by CFP close date, but there are 5 at the top that close this week, in case you want to submit talks.

  • Strange Loop (St Louis, September 24-26): CFP closes May 15th. Emerging tech, security, front-end, systems architecture.
  • DjangoCon (Austin, September 6-11): CFP closes May 15th. Python.
  • ZendCon (Las Vegas, October 19-22): CFP closes May 15th. PHP.
  • PyOhio (Columbus, August 1-2): CFP closes May 15th. Pyton.
  • PostgresOpen (Dallas, September 16-18): CFP closes May 17th. PostgreSQL.
  • Ignite OSCON (Portland, July 20): CFP closes June 5th. Open Source.
  • Thunder Plains (Oklahoma City, November 3): CFP closes June 14th. Development / Mobile.
  • Midwest UX (Pittsburgh, October 1-3): CFP closes June 15th. UI/UX.
  • Rocky Mountain Ruby (Boulder, September 24-25): CFP closes June 15th. Ruby.
  • DerbyCon (Louisville, September 23-27): CFP closes July 20th. Security.
  • RICON (San Francisco, November 4-6): CFP closes August 30th. Distributed systems.
  • APIDays (San Francisco, June 17-18): API Design, IoT.
  • Little Rock TechFest (Little Rock, October 16th): Open Technology.

entry.title: Conference Calls for Proposals in North America (03/23)
entry.content:
Hi all,

We have a nice list of good conference calls for proposals out right now in North America. I’ve also included OSCON out in Amsterdam to the list, because it’s a heavy hitter conference. Enjoy.

  • Pittsburgh Techfest (Pittsburg, June 13)
  • Forward JS (San Francisco, July)
  • AppNation IoT (Santa Clara, July 21): CFP closes June 1st
  • Code on the Beach (Atlantic City, August 7-8): CFP closes March 31st
  • That Conference (Wisconsin Dells, August 10-12): CFP opens March 30th
  • 360|iDev (Denver, August 16-19)
  • Northeast PHP (Boston, August 22-23)
  • Surge (National Harbor MD, September 23-25): CFP closes March 31st
  • DataWeek (Santa Clara, Sept 28-30): CFP closes August 7th
  • All Things Open (Raleigh, Oct 18-20)
  • HTML5DevConf (San Francisco, Oct 19-23): CFP closes June 24th
  • CSS Dev Conf (Long Beach, October 26-28): CFP closes April 5th
  • OSCON (Amsterdam, October 26-28): CFP closes Mat 11th
  • Full Stack Toronto (Toronto, November 14-15): CFP closes October 9th

entry.title: Conference Calls for Proposals in North America (02/13)
entry.content:
We have more conferences accepting proposals in North America. This list has a range of language and specialty conferences, and one of the big ones below is Grace Hopper.

I’ve sorted the list based on CFP close date, to make it easier to figure out which one to submit to first:

  • EmpireJS (New York, April 26-27): CFP closes February 15th
  • Self.conference (Detroit, May 29-30): CFP closes February 16th
  • CascadiaJS (Blaine WA, July 8-10): CFP closes March 15th
  • DevOps Days Toronto (Toronto, May 14-15): CFP closes February 28th
  • Front Porch (Dallas, Oct 7): CFP closes March 20th
  • Grace Hopper (Houston, Oct 14-16): CFP closes March 20th
  • CSS Dev Conf 2015 (Long Beach, October 26-28): CFP closes April 5th
  • Madison+ UX (Madison, July 10-11): CFP closes April 18th
  • Madison+ Ruby (Madison, August 21-22): CFP closes May 9th
  • AlterConf Chicago (Multiple Locations / Dates)
  • Twin Cities Code Camp (Minneapolis, April 25th)

entry.title: Conference Calls for Proposals in North America (01/29)
entry.content:
With a slow start on many conferences opening up their calls for proposals this year, many have begun opening up for new speaker proposals. Here’s a list of many of the interesting conference CFPs in North America at the moment, sorted by CFP close date:

  • POSSCON (Columbia SC, April 14-15): CFP closes January 30th
  • Dev objective (Bloomington MN, May 12-15): CFP closes January 31st
  • IoT Stream Conf (San Francisco, April 28): CFP closes January 31st
  • Mountain West (Salt Lake City, March 3-4) CFP closes January 31st
  • Monitorama (Portland, June 15-17): CFP closes Feb 1st
  • OSCON: CFP closes February 2nd
  • Velocity: CFP closes February 2nd
  • Twilio Signal (San Francisco, May 19-20): CFP closes February 20th
  • LambdaConf (Boulder CO, May 22-24): CFP closes February 27th
  • Open Source Bridge (Portland, June 23-26): CFP closes March 7th
  • Droidcon Montreal (Montreal QC, April 9-10): CFP closes March 8th
  • Front Porch (Dallas, Oct 7): CFP closes March 20th
  • GopherCon (Denver, July 7-10): CFP closes March 31st
  • QCon (New York, June 8-12): CFP closes April 8th
  • Internet of Things (Boston, May 28-29): CFP closes April 23rd
  • Future Insights Live (Las Vegas, June 1-4)
  • Internet of Things Summit (San Francisco, November 19-20): CFP closes October 15th
  • NodeConf (Oakland CA, June 8-9)
